name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: World of Warcraft Lich King Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the frozen power of the Lich King with chilling visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the frozen power of the Lich King from World of Warcraft with this epic live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A chilling and commanding interface inspired by the Lich King's dominion over the undead and his terrifying presence in Northrend.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that echoes the Lich King’s cold, unyielding power.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Immerse yourself in WoW-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as cold and powerful as the Lich King’s reign.
